Package com.agentclient

Class AgentClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agentclient.AgentClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class AgentClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class to represent an instance of the agent client independent of JavaFX UI.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AgentClient

        public AgentClient​(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.Long balance,
                   int port,
                   java.lang.String IP,
                   LoginController fxThread)
        Agent client constructor. Establishes connection with bank and sends name and balance info. Acquires any existing auction house connections registered with the bank.
        Parameters:
        name - Agent Name
        balance - Initial Balance

      • hasActiveBids

      • updateAHConnections

        public void updateAHConnections()
        Requests auction house data from bank server. Adds any new available connections.

      • updateAuctions

        public void updateAuctions()
        Update auction data. Will collect current auction information from bank and attempt to make any new connections. Will then request auction data from each bank and add it to the list of buffered items.
